Package gameLogic

Class BoardFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameLogic.BoardFactory
  • public class BoardFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Makes boards filled with pieces, which also have moves.
    Author:
    Alexander

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BoardFactory​(Teams teams)
      Constructs a piecefactory for this boardfactory by default.
      BoardFactory​(Teams teams, PieceFactory pieceFactory)
      A piecefactory must be supplied in the constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Board blankBoard​(int x, int y)
      Creates a board with no pieces of a specified size.
      Board castleBoard​(int x, int y)
      Returns a castle debug board.
      Board chaturangaBoard()
      Returns a standard board.
      Board shuffleBoard()
      Returns a randomized shuffle chess board.
      Board standardBoard​(int x, int y)
      Returns a standard board.

    • Method Detail

      • blankBoard

        public Board blankBoard​(int x,
                        int y)
        Creates a board with no pieces of a specified size.
        Parameters:
        x - The width of the board.
        y - The height of the board.
        Returns:
        The completely blank board.

      • standardBoard

        public Board standardBoard​(int x,
                           int y)
        Returns a standard board. Should be deprecated when the proper factory gets implemented
        Parameters:
        x - The width of the board.
        y - The height of the board.
        Returns:
        A board using standard chess setup.

      • castleBoard

        public Board castleBoard​(int x,
                         int y)
        Returns a castle debug board. Should be deprecated when the proper factory gets implemented
        Parameters:
        x - The width of the board.
        y - The height of the board.
        Returns:
        A board using castle debug setup.

      • shuffleBoard

        public Board shuffleBoard()
        Returns a randomized shuffle chess board. Should be deprecated when the proper factory gets implemented
        Returns:
        A board using standard chess setup.

      • chaturangaBoard

        public Board chaturangaBoard()
        Returns a standard board. Should be deprecated when the proper factory gets implemented
        Returns:
        A board using standard chess setup.
